exec: pm.test('should fail with an error on the "FullName" property', () => {

body.raw:
{
    "fullName": "John",
    "emailAddress": "john.triangle@vigilante.com",
    "bio": "John Triangle is a brilliant astrophysicist and a stargazing enthusiast renowned for his groundbreaking contributions to the field of space exploration. Born and raised under the vast, starry skies of a remote desert town, John's fascination with the cosmos began at an early age. He earned a degree in Astrophysics from the esteemed Celestial Institute, launching him on a trajectory toward scientific stardom. John's research has taken him on a cosmic journey, from studying distant quasars and black holes to deciphering the mysteries of dark matter and the origins of the universe itself. His work has earned him international acclaim, establishing him as a leading authority in astrophysical studies. Beyond his scientific endeavors, John is an ardent promoter of space exploration and science education. He frequently delivers captivating talks and lectures, inspiring both aspiring scientists and the general public to reach for the stars. In his spare time, John indulges in amateur astronomy, capturing breathtaking celestial images through his telescope. With his boundless curiosity and passion for understanding the universe, John Triangle is an astronomical luminary, illuminating the path to greater cosmic understanding for all.",
    "password": "Abc.12345",
    "passwordConfirmation": "Abc.12345"
}
